Hello to you alla again.

The sword has arrived=
, it was much better that i thought it would be, the
blade has a lot of dri=
ed oil on it , need to get this off in a nice and
smoth way, and i FINALY g=
et the Tsuka off it, i understand why the former
owner didnt want to take i=
t off, the mekugi has been there for a long time.
But anyway i did found Me=
i on both sides of the Nakago, i have taken 2
pictures of it , more comming=
 on the blade, mountings,and saya, when my
camera are ready again.
Can anyo=
ne translate the mei=B4s on it???
